subject: Project submission deadline
body: Hello Rayan, could you please confirm the submission deadline for the project?

subject: Interview invitation
body: We would like to invite you for an interview tomorrow at 10am.

subject: Why havenâ€™t you replied?
body: THIS IS URGENT. I EXPECT A RESPONSE ASAP!!!

subject: Course assignment submission
body: Hello Rayan, I hope you are doing well. Please confirm that you have received the assignment submission for the data mining course. Thank you.

subject: Internship interview follow-up
body: Hello, we would like to follow up regarding your internship interview. Please let us know your availability this week. Best regards.

subject: Meeting confirmation
body: Hi Rayan, just confirming our meeting scheduled tomorrow at 11 AM. Please confirm if that still works for you.
